author: kenney
msg: Fix a bug in determining includes/excludes in a dependencyTrail.
The join(",", list).indexOf(pattern) approach does NOT work: any substring
will be matched, for instance: 'org.apache.maven:maven-artifact-manager' will be matched
Changed pattern matching to include a starting and ending separator char so the complete
Updated all the unit tests to use proper dependency trails with packaging and version,
since a ':' is now needed in the dependency trail items (in the real environment this is
always the case; ArtifactResolutionNode which sets the dependency trail uses the Artifact.getId()
which always contains packaging and version).
[sorry for all the +/- lines but some people seem to commit files with trailing spaces on empty lines].

author: cdupoirieux
msg: content-main-conf parameter is "seen" at every level, no need to pass it as param...
